alert.note: Alert for Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 12:16PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT GARRETT COUNTY... At 1214 PM EST, an area of heavy snow was located over Grantsville, or near Bittinger, moving southeast at 25 mph. Snow showers will combine with gusts over 30 mph to cause visibilities to briefly drop below a half mile at times. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. Locations impacted include... Mountain Lake Park, Oakland, Bittinger, Grantsville, Loch Lynn Heights, Friendsville, Deer Park, Accident, Merrill, Keysers Ridge, Jennings, Mineral Spring, Deep Creek Lake State Park, Swallow Falls State Park, McHenry, Selbysport, Big Run State Park, New Germany, Piney Grove and McComas Beach. A winter weather advisory is in effect for the area. Please monitor local media outlets and the national weather service for further statements. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
